title: Auditor

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cover a player in smoke at night.
- Audit a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you cover a player in smoke, they will be informed and they will not learn anything that happened to them that night. You will learn their role and win condition.
- Visitors of your target will learn that their target was covered in smoke and not receive any investigative information that night.
- When you audit a player, you will roleblock them and cause them to lose all charges of any limited-use abilities they have. They will be informed of this. They will receive the charges back once you die.
- You will leave the Town once all Townies are dead.
